thread.section_title: The New Yorker A Wyndham Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice suite with view
thread.title_full: Nice suite with view - Review of The New Yorker A Wyndham Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dan G
title: Nice suite with view
text:
The beds here seemed small to me, I questioned the front desk as to why the queen bed seemed smaller than the one I have at home and if I got the room I paid for. To make me happy they were nice enough to upgrade me from a simple cheap queen bed room to a two room, two bathroom suite with a walk out balcony that had views of MSG and the empire state building. The room was a little rough around the edges, but that's ok it's an old building in new york city. The bed was still equally smaller than I expected. But the customer service and the view were great for the price.
Room Tip: Some rooms have a sliding glass door onto a balcony with chairs. See more room tips
